title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr Mochdre, Aberconwy
title.cy: Casgliad o luniau o gangen Merched y Wawr Mochdre, Rhanbarth Aberconwy

description.en: Gwibdaith cangen Mochdre i Meithrinfa Glyndwr, Corwen, 2015. (cefn) Ann Roberts, Eluned Davies, Iona Webster, Catherine Jones, Beryl DAvies, Annwen Edwards, Glenys Williams, Doreen Davies, Rhiannon Parry, Eluned Jones (canol) Helen Jones, Shirley Carruthers, Morfudd Bellis, Mona Gliss, (blaen) Eirlys Hughes, Gwenda Williams, Gaynor Jones, Dulun Waters, Hafwen Williams, Rhiannon Dart, Julie Williams.
